actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize funds for school based fluoride rinse programs.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to States for dental disease control programs. Authorizes appropriations through fiscal year 1981 for fluoride rinse programs to be administered in schools.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize funds for school based fluoride rinse programs.
